H0.text: Streak is considered a property of soil.

H1.text: Fracture is considered a property of soil.

H2.text: Texture is considered a property of soil.

H3.text: Luster is considered a property of soil.

A4.text: Chemical and physical properties of a soil are related to texture.

A5.text: Soil texture has agricultural applications such as determining crop suitability and to predict the response of the soil to environmental and management conditions such as drought or calcium (lime) requirements.
